entry.title: Lab Website Launch
entry.content:
title: Group Website Launch Announcement image: author: janghoon-ock tags:

We are thrilled to announce the official launch ðŸš€ of our groupâ€™s website: The Ock Research Group.

Our GitHub also hosts a Calcium Imaging Pipeline in Jupyter notebook format, along with the latest updates and resources. Check it out: https://github.com/CGK-Laboratory
